ACN. 000000 IMeChewn TT |RefNo OFBAI0A |
FROM Ive AKwiKhw/Rwpesh |]
[CONT DmosNe ||]
[COMPOSITION [104 Combed Coton | | |

S.No Colour Colour Reference Quantity
1 FrostGreyMel SHMNo 1805 50 55000 2750000
TOTAL 750000
DELIVERY DATE : IMMIDIATE
GST extra from quoted price
Company GST: 20AAHHA7223C1ZM
Quantity :+ or - 5% acceptable
All cones to be winded to 1000 gms
Company TIN : 29870701280
Dyes must be Azo free
Payment term : Against delivery
Dispatch : Door Delivery on to pay basis
Colour matching : D-65 light source

{
  "po_number": "OFBAI0A",
  "from": "Ive AKwiKhw/Rwpesh",
  "composition": "100% Combed Cotton",
  "items": [
    {
      "s_no": 1,
      "colour": "FrostGreyMel",
      "reference": "SHMNo 1805",
      "quantity_kg": 50,
      "rate": 55000,
      "total": 2750000
    }
  ],
  "total": 750000,
  "delivery_date": "Immediate",
  "gst": "20AAHHA7223C1ZM",
  "tin": "29870701280",
  "remarks": [
    "GST extra from quoted price",
    "+/- 5% quantity acceptable",
    "All cones to be winded to 1000 gms",
    "Dyes must be Azo free",
    "Payment: Against delivery",
    "Dispatch: Door delivery on to pay basis",
    "Colour matching: D-65 light source"
  ]
}
